notesStmt.note: A register of payments due for books sold. The books are all Gaonic works, including Tafsir Rasag le-sefer Daniyel (presumably that of R. Sa'adia Gaon and not those of his Karaite counterparts, as the rest of the items here are Rabbanite), Sheʾeltot of R. Aḥa, Kitab al-Biwa'wal-Ashria (R. Ḥai Gaon's legal monograph). The list also includes descriptions of the bindings.
Condition: nearly complete; damaged, faded; verso is blank.
